identity.mission: Create a premium, emotionally directed eCommerce experience that feels like a mix of Apple, Glossier, and Muji. Avoid generic templates.

project_info.name: Beautivra
project_info.description: Modern, minimal, premium beauty & self-care essentials brand focused on high-quality tools and accessories.
project_info.key_vibe: Minimal, Clean, Premium, Elegant, Soft, Tactile.

typography.strategy: The Old Money Tech (Classic Serif Head + Sterile Mono/Sans Body)

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

accents.usage: Price tags, technical specs, small labels (optional for 'Muji' feel).

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16 for section padding.
spacing.grid_gap: gap-8 or gap-12 for marketing, gap-4 for product grids.

visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-none (Muji style) or rounded-lg (Apple style). Decision: rounded-sm (2px-4px) for a sharp, premium feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for floating elements. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #E5E5E5. Use border-b for grid items to create a 'technical' look.

hero.usage: Main Hero Background or Split Layout

marketing_pages.grid_system: Mode A: The Tetris Grid. Asymmetrical layouts for 'Why Beautivra'.
marketing_pages.hero_section: Split screen (Text Left, Image Right) OR Full-screen immersive image with centered typography.
marketing_pages.typography_scale: Headings: text-5xl to text-7xl. Body: text-lg.

ecommerce_pages.product_grid: Clean, 2-column on mobile, 4-column on desktop. Minimalist cards (Image + Name + Price). No 'Add to Cart' button clutter on grid.
ecommerce_pages.product_detail: Sticky info on right, scrollable gallery on left. Large, high-res images.
ecommerce_pages.cart: Slide-out drawer (Sheet component) or clean dedicated page.

header.elements: Logo (Serif), Nav Links (Hidden on mobile), Icons (Search, Cart, User).

buttons.primary: Solid Black (#1A1A1A), White Text, Sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Hover: Scale 1.02.
buttons.secondary: Outline Black, Transparent BG. Hover: bg-black/5.

cards.product: No border, no shadow. Image aspect ratio 4:5 (Portrait). Text below image, left aligned.
cards.feature: Bento grid style. Light gray background (#F2EFE9) with centered content.

footer.style: Dark Mode (#1A1A1A bg, #F9F8F6 text). Massive padding (py-20).
footer.content: Newsletter signup (prominent), Links columns, Social icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new font families and color palette.
3. BUILD LAYOUTS: Start with the Homepage using the 'Tetris Grid' for the 'Why Beautivra' section.
4. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Pexels/Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
5. SHADCN: Customize Shadcn components (Buttons, Inputs, Sheets) to match the 'Soft Luxury' aesthetic (remove default rounded-md, use rounded-sm).
6. ANIMATION: Add 'framer-motion' for subtle fade-ins on scroll. No aggressive bouncing.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'add-to-cart-btn', 'nav-link-shop').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no default blue/purple gradients.
Dark colors must be solid, not gradients.
Never use emoji icons. Use Lucide icons.
